Honing Stone.description:
When used with the Bear Trap, the honing stone sharpens its blades. The razor sharp blades inflicts deep wounds aimed at bleeding the victim as fast as possible.

The trapped victim is left dying instead of injured if they free themselves.

Serrated Jaws.description:
These replacement Bear Trap jaws have saw like blades which cause awful open wounds when they snap.

Bear Traps inflict Hemorrhage on trapped Survivors until they are healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors.

Trapper Bag.description:
A cured leather waist bag. Large and sturdy to transport hunting equipment.

Start with 1 extra Bear Trap.Allows the transportation of 1 extra Bear Trap.

Wax Brick.description:
A block of wax used to lower friction and facilitate movement in mechanical parts.

Increases the time required to rescue a Survivor or attempt escape from a Bear Trap by 33%.

Lengthened Jaws.description:
Jaws with long teeth that dig further into the flesh than a conventional Bear Trap.

When Survivors escape Bear Traps, they are inflicted with Deep Wound.

Deep Wound will put a Survivor in the dying state unless it is mended before the timer runs out.

Tar Bottle.description:
A black, matte and sticky substance similar to tar. When applied to Bear Traps, makes them far less noticeable.

Darkens the appearance of Bear Traps.

Makeshift Wrap.description:
A scratched and worn brace made of thick, cured animal skin.

The Trapper cannot be caught in his Bear Traps.Bear Traps will be disarmed if The Trapper steps on them.

4-Coil Spring Kit.description:
A replacement kit for Bear Traps which changes the usual dual spring system with 4 coil springs adding a great amount of strength to the traps' hold.

Increases time required for Survivors to disarm Bear Traps by 33%.

Trapper Sack.description:
A crude leather sack suitable for foraging.

All Bear Traps are carried at the beginning of the Trial instead of spawning on the map.Bear Traps cannot be picked up.

Trapper Gloves.description:
Protective padded leather gloves.

Increases Bear Trap setting speed by 30%.

Secondary Coil.description:
A secondary coil which keeps a Bear Trap effective in times when the primary coils becomes unusable.

Increases time required for Survivors to disarm Bear Traps by 50%.

Fastening Tools.description:
A specialized set of tools used to fasten Bear Traps to ensure their effectiveness.

Increases Bear Trap setting speed by 50%.Increases the time required to rescue a Survivor or attempt escape from a Bear Trap by 25%.

Padded Jaws.description:
These padded jaws are meant to restrain, not to wound.

Bear Traps do not inflict damage on trapped Survivors. Equipping this add-on negates the effects of Rusted Jaws and Serrated Jaws.Points awarded for trapping Survivors are increased by 100%.

Bear Oil.description:
Melted animal fat that can lubricate the Bear Trap's squeaky joints.

Setting a Bear Trap is silent.

Bone Clapper.description: A bell clapper made from a highly polished piece of bone. Causes the sounds of the Wailing Bell to echo and warp chaotically.Survivors can no longer discern the Wailing Bell's distance or direction.

\"The Ghost\" - Soot.description:
The Khugwemuu symbol, representing the spirit world, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

After Uncloaking, the Wraith's Terror Radius and Red Stain will remain suppressed for 6 seconds.

\"The Hound\" - Soot.description:
The Wonnug symbol, representing a peerless tracker, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

While Cloaked, fresh blood marks are brighter than normal.

\"Blind Warrior\" - Mud.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.

Uncloak surprise attacks inflict Survivors with Blindness for 60 seconds. Blindness prevents survivors from seeing auras.

\"Swift Hunt\" - Mud.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.

Increases uncloaking speed by 8%.

\"Swift Hunt\" - Blood.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.

Increases uncloaking speed by 12%.

\"The Beast\" - Soot.description:
The Kunwulju symbol, representing the realm of fear, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

The Wraith's Terror Radius is no longer suppressed while Cloaked.Bloodpoints granted for Stalking and surprise attacks are increased by 100%.

\"All Seeing\" - Blood.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, is stamped in blood on the head of the Bell.

Unlocks hidden potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the auras of Survivors within 8 meters are revealed to you.

\"Windstorm\" - Mud.description: The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 5%.

\"Windstorm\" - White.description: The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 7%.

\"Blink\" - Mud.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in mud on the body of the Bell.

Increases cloaking speed by 40%.

\"Blink\" - White.description:
The Kratin symbol, representing quick passing, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Increases cloaking speed by 60%.

\"All Seeing\" - Spirit.description:
The Kra-Frabai symbol, representing The Entity watching over us, glows ominously on the head of the bell.

Unlocks awesome potential in one's aura reading ability. While Cloaked, the repair progress of generators can be determined by the intensity of their auras.

\"The Serpent\" - Soot.description:
The Oas-Nek symbol, representing cunning, is finger-drawn out of soot on the body of the bell.

The Wraith will Uncloak completely when breaking pallets or walls, or damaging generators while Cloaked.

\"Shadow Dance\" - White.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Increases speed of vaulting windows, breaking pallets or walls, and damaging generators by 40% while cloaked.

\"Shadow Dance\" - Blood.description:
The Yiwarick symbol, representing dark synergy, is stamped in blood on the body of the Bell.

Increases speed of vaulting windows, breaking pallets or walls, and damaging generators by 60% while cloaked.

\"Blind Warrior\" - White.description:
The Baikra-Kaeug symbol, representing ferocity, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Uncloak surprise attacks inflict Mangled and Hemorrhage until fully healed.

Hemorrhage regresses healing progress when not healing, and increases blood trails left by injured survivors.

Mangled increases time required to heal by 25% and lasts until fully healed.

Coxcombed Clapper.description:
A simple coxcomb knotted rope wrapped around the bell clapper to muffle its sound. A malevolent aura emanates from it.

Renders the Wailing Bell completely silent.

\"Swift Hunt\" - White.description:
The Kuntin-Takkho symbol, representing rapid descent on prey, is finger-drawn in white ink on the body of the Bell.

Increases uncloaking speed by 10%.

\"Windstorm\" - Blood.description:
The Ohuwe-Onmnea symbol, representing a howling storm, is stamped in blood on the body of the bell.

Increases the Wraith's movement speed while cloaked by 9%.

Plaid Flannel.description:
A torn piece of red and black plaid flannel. The scrap of fabric imbues The Nurse with devastating focus.

Allows the Nurse to see the Blink target location.

White Nit Comb.description:
A parasitic nit comb taken from the clinic. Once the symbol of a deep connection between an anxious patient and her nurse.

Decreases the length of Blink attack lunges by 50%.Increases Bloodpoints for Blink attack score events by 100%.

Pocket Watch.description:
A charred and broken pocket watch with rattling pieces. Taken from Nurse Moris' body.

Increases the time before The Nurse succumbs to fatigue after Blinking by 20%.

Anxious Gasp.description:
The gasp of surprise collected from an anxious girl which The Nurse was fond of. Twitches vigorously at The Nurse's touch.

Blinking past a survivor causes them to scream and awards 200 Bloodpoints for spooking them.

Torn Bookmark.description:
A white and pristine piece of ribbon once attached to a sacred book. Serves as the symbol of a dispute.

Adds 1 Blink charge.Increases Blink recharge time by 50%.

Dark Cincture.description:
A black rope used as a belt in times of mourning. Taken from Father Campbell's body.

Decreases Blink recharge time by 13%.

Fragile Wheeze.description:
The whistling and rattling breath stolen from Father Campbell. Silently curves and bends at The Nurse's touch.

Decreases Blink recharge time by 20%.

Campbell's Last Breath.description:
A powerful last breath snatched from Crotus Prenn asylum priest Father Campbell. In the hands of The Nurse, it crackles with intensity.

After reappearing from a fully charged Blink, The Nurse immediately Blinks at half charge in the direction she is currently facing.

Metal Spoon.description:
A dull, partially rusted and stained metallic spoon. Confiscated from room 202's patient, the "Bad Man".

Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink attack causes their sounds of pain to be 50% louder for 60 seconds.

Bad Man Keepsake.description:
A rotten molar extirpated from the "Bad Man's" cold dead hand.

Hitting a survivor with a successful Blink attack causes their aura to be revealed when healing or being healed within a 28 meter range for 60 seconds.

Wooden Horse.description:
An unpainted toy carved out of cheap wood to resemble a horse. Once the symbol of a deep connection between a catatonic patient and his nurse.

Decreases extra fatigue from missed Blink attacks by 50%.

Catatonic Boy's Treasure.description:
A pine-cone which unexpectedly calmed a patient's repetitive movement. Taken from the catatonic boy's body.

Decreases extra fatigue from chain Blinks by 100%.

Dad's Boots.description:
A pair of trusty boots, pulled from the corpse of Max Thompson Sr.

Increases Chainsaw Sprint turn rate by 28%.

Heavy Clutch.description:
A well-made clutch that keeps the chain moving smoothly.

Decreases the width of the Chainsaw's collision zone by 30%.

Junkyard Air Filter.description:
A cracked and dusty filter, it still manages to work better than the stock model.

Increases the Chainsaw’s overheat limit by 20%.

Punctured Muffler.description:
A roughly modified muffler that allows for extra air flow.

Increases the Chainsaw's rate of cooling by 50%.

Steel Toe Boots.description:
Boots with a reinforced toe that offer protection from impact.

Decreases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 12%.

Black Grease.description:
Thick grease that can be applied beneath the eyes to reduce glare.

Increases Chainsaw charge speed by 18% for 30 seconds after being blinded.

Big Buckle.description:
A glorious, shining belt worn by many good ol’ country boys.

Decreases Terror Radius by 8 meters when the Chainsaw is overheated.

Leafy Mash.description:
A wet mash of fragrant leaves that mask a hunter’s scent when stalking prey.

Gain the Undetectable status effect for 15 seconds after landing a Chainsaw hit.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

LoPro Chains.description:
Light chains that decrease the weight of the Chainsaw, allowing for greater maneuverability.

Continue a Chainsaw Sprint after breaking a pallet or wall.Survivors hit with the Chainsaw within 5 seconds of breaking a pallet or a wall are damaged for a single health state.

Mother's Helpers.description:
A small number of caffeine pills found in Evelyn Thompson’s purse. Side effects include nervousness and irritability.

Increases Chainsaw charge speed by 18% for 30 seconds after being stunned by pallet.

Speed Limiter.description:
A mechanical device that limits the amount of fuel small engines can intake at one time, forcing a constant and safe speed.

Chainsaw does not automatically trigger dying state.Get 100% more Bloodpoints for Chainsaw Hit score events.

Off-Brand Motor Oil.description:
Affordable oil that can be used to lubricate noisy chains.

Decreases the noise made by the Chainsaw by 30%.

Tuned Carburettor.description:
Despite being caked in dirt and oil, this carburetor has been well adjusted.

Increases Chainsaw charge speed by 25%.Decreases base movement speed to 4.4 m/s.

Death Engravings.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body counting the amount of lives it took. Fills the user with determination.

Increases Chainsaw Sprint movement speed by 15%.Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 14%.Decreases heat generated while charging the Chainsaw by 14%.

Doom Engravings.description:
Engravings found on the Chainsaw body representing the dark beast that lives in The Fog. Fills the user with determination.

Increases Chainsaw Sprint movement speed by 20%.Increases time required to charge the Chainsaw by 14%.Decreases heat generated while charging the Chainsaw by 14%.

Apex Muffler.description:
A masterfully crafted chainsaw muffler that outperforms all others.

Chainsaw is silent for Survivors outside the Terror Radius.

Low Kickback Chains.description:
A specialized chain that reduces the likelihood of kickback.

Decreases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 28%.

Pighouse Gloves.description:
Rancid smelling gloves, soiled with unknown substances. Despite everything wrong with them, they do have thick fabric.

While the Chainsaw is overheated:Increases action speed by 20% when breaking pallets or walls or damaging generators.Decreases duration of pallet stuns by 50%.

Spiked Boots.description:
Boots with strapped-on pieces of metal which burrow in mud for more stability and control with each step.

Increases Chainsaw Sprint turn speed by 44%Increases recovery time after hitting an object with the Chainsaw by 28%

Barb's Glasses.description:
A broken pair of glasses that traveled to the Upside Down.

Decreases Shred pallet break cooldown by 15%.

Black Heart.description:
A black fermented heart ripped from the chest of a tentacled creature in the Upside Down.

Decreases Shred hit cooldown by 15%.

Brass Case Lighter.description:
A lighter used to ignite trouble.

Proximity to Portals inflicts Survivors with Blindness. Once out of contact with the Portal, this effect persists for 45 seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Deer Lung.description:
A raw, rubbery lung that reinvigorates The Demogorgon.

Eleven's Soda.description:
A soda can charged with psychic energy.

Leprose Lichen.description:
A potent lichen that grows like dust on the rocks in the Upside Down.

Lifeguard Whistle.description:
A rusty, metal whistle that once ruled the Hawkins public pool.

Mews' Guts.description:
The tasty guts of an unfortunate victim.

Rat Liver.description: A soggy pile of salty, soft liver.Increases movement speed while charging Of The Abyss by 3.5%.

Rat Tail.description: A chewy rat tail for The Demogorgon to consume.Increases speed of opening a Portal by 35%.

Red Moss.description:
A psychedelic moss that grows on tree barks in the Upside Down.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius, and Red Stain.

Rotten Green Tripe.description: Rotten tripe that fuels The Demogorgon.Increases Upside Down movement speed by 15%.

Rotten Pumpkin.description:
Pumpkin flesh infected by the rotten soil in Hawkins.

When traversing the Upside Down, the Portal you enter is destroyed. Gain an additional 200 Bloodpoints for the traversal.

Sticky Lining.description:
A fetid, viscous layer that covers and expands the interdimensional tunnels.

Thorny Vines.description:
Thick, thorny vines that stretch and reinforce the interdimensional tunnels.

Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 11%Increases the distance from Portals at which Survivors can be detected by Of The Abyss by 1 meter.

Unknown Egg.description:
A large, warm egg coated in gruesome webbing.

Decreases the cooldown after traversing the Upside Down by 1.5 seconds.

Upside Down Resin.description: A sticky, flammable sap that fortifies the gateway to the interdimensional tunnels.Increases time required for Survivors to seal Portals by 40%.

Vermilion Webcap.description:
A bright red poisonous mushroom from the Upside Down.

Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 3 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Violet Waxcap.description:
A dark fleshed mushroom from the Upside Down that allows The Demogorgon to telepathically distort the senses in its prey.

Increases the duration of the Undetectable effect gained when emerging from a Portal by 0.5 seconds.

Undetectable hides the Killer's aura, Terror Radius and Red Stain.

Black Box.description:
A black cardboard box filled with photographs.

Blue Dress.description:
A little girl's pale blue dress with white lace which front is ruined by large cuts.

Class Photo.description:
A large photograph taken at Badham preschool showing the cheerful class of 94-95.

A small claw rake, a must have tool for any accomplished gardener.

A little girl's green dress with a silky white ribbon.

A long double dutch jump rope, stained with many years of use.

Kid's Drawing.description: An unattributed drawing clearly crafted by a young child.Decreases the speed penalty inflicted by Dream Snares to 5%.Grants 200 bonus Devious Bloodpoints when a Survivor triggers a Dream Snare.

Nancy's Masterpiece.description:
A painting of a character, made by Nancy Holbrook at Badham and kept as a treasured memory.

A crude and bold sketch made with fusain, signed Nancy H.

Pill Bottle.description:
An empty pill bottle which once contained a medicine called Zoneral.

An unnaturally cold silver necklace split into four, one for each best friend.

Defaced Smiley Pin.description:
A once friendly-looking bright yellow button of a defaced smiley. A signature icon of The Legion.

A wooden ruler deeply etched with the names of enemies.
